TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPoint extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties

summary.span: 表示存储在 类中的数据点。

span.span: Represents a data point that is stored in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储属性与数据，以及数据点值相关联。The class stores properties associated with data as well as data point values. 例如，数据点都有一个值，但它还具有颜色属性、 背景图像属性，背景渐变属性等。For example, a data point has a value, but it also has a color property, background image property, background gradient property, and so forth. 点属性的数据有关的详细信息，请参阅类概述主题。For more information about data point properties, see the class overview topic. 每个数据点由 X 值和一个或多个 Y 值组成。Each data point consists of an X-value and one or more Y-values. X 值可以是零，也可以显式设置。The X-value can be zero, or you can set this explicitly. 每个点的仅一个 Y 值是必需的所有图表类型中除气泡图、 k 线图和股价图。Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except bubble, candlestick and stock charts. 这些图表类型需要多个 Y 值，因为一个数据点的多个值组成。These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values. 例如，若要绘制一个股票图表列，四个值是必需的： 高、 低、 打开和关闭的值。For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values. 可以在设计时添加数据或运行时间;此外可以在运行时使用数据绑定。Data can be added at either design time or run time; you can also use data-binding at run time.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可用于创建和初始化的新实例类。This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 但是，强烈建议您改为在运行时添加数据点时，使用集合属性。However, it is highly recommended that you instead add data points at run time, using the collection property.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为`true`将标记为空点的数据点。Set this property to `true` to mark a data point as an empty point. 或者之一`InsertEmptyPoints`中的方法类可用于将标记为空点缺失数据。Alternatively one of the `InsertEmptyPoints` methods in the class can be used to mark missing data as empty points. 属性确定如何将空点会显示。The property determines how empty points are displayed.

span.span: The X-value of the data point.

param.name: yValue
param.span: 数据点的 Y 值的列表。

span.span: A list of Y-values of the data point.

summary.span: 设置数据点的 X 值以及一个或多个 Y 值。

span.span: Sets the X-value and one or more Y-values of the data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以在运行时设置的数据点的值。Use the method to set the value(s) of a data point at run-time. 请注意，是否将 X 值设置为零 (0) 以外的值，将生成一个散点图。Note that if you set the X-value to a value other than zero (0), a scatter plot will be generated. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅备注部分的属性。For further details, see the Remarks section of the property. 请参阅下表中的可用对象类型参数的有效.NET Framework 类型的完整列表。Refer to the following table for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameter. |||| |-|-|-| |StringString|DateTimeDateTime|DoubleDouble| |十进制Decimal|SingleSingle|Int32Int32| |UInt32UInt32|Int64Int64|UInt64UInt64|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetValueY(object[] yValue) cil managed
Public Sub SetValueY (ParamArray yValue As Object())

param.name: yValue
param.span: 集合中某个 对象的 Y 值。

span.span: The Y-value(s) of a object in the collection.

param.span: 格式化为用逗号分隔的一个或多个值。

span.span: Formatted as one or more values separated by commas.

summary.span: 设置单个数据点的 Y 值。

span.span: Sets the Y-value(s) of a single data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于设置 Y 的值的数据点在运行时。The property is used to set the Y-value(s) of a data point at run time. 每个点的仅一个 Y 值是必需的所有图表类型中除气泡图、 k 线图和股价图。Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except for bubble, candlestick and stock charts. 这些图表类型需要多个 Y 值，因为一个数据点的多个值组成。These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values. 例如，若要绘制一个股票图表列，四个值是必需的： 高、 低、 打开和关闭的值。For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values. 此属性返回的数组`double`值时用于检索多个 Y 值。This property returns an array of `double` values when used to retrieve multiple Y-values. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性确定中所有数据都点的 Y 值的最大数目可以有。The property determines the maximum number of Y-values that all data points in a can have. 如果指定多个允许的 Y 值数，将引发异常。If you specify more than the allowable number of Y-values, an exception will be raised. > > 请参阅下表中的可用对象类型参数的有效.NET Framework 类型的完整列表：Refer to the following table for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameter: |||| |-|-|-| |StringString|DateTimeDateTime|DoubleDouble| |十进制Decimal|SingleSingle|Int32Int32| |UInt32UInt32|Int64Int64|UInt64UInt64|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double XValue { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.XValue : double with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置数据点的 X 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the X-value of a data point.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示数据点的 X 值。

span.span: A that represents the X-value of a data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有图表类型可以都显示为散点图或作为非散点图，因为可以设置 X 值和 Y 值。All chart types can be displayed as either scatter plots or as non-scatter plots, because both X-values and Y-values can be set. 设置 X 值将导致散点图，而不设置此属性，这等同于将它设置为零，将导致非散点图。Setting an X-value will result in a scatter plot, whereas not setting this property—which is equivalent to setting it to zero—will result in a non-scatter plot. 例如，若要绘制点图图表类型，请添加具有 X 值为零的数据点。For example, to draw a point chart type, add data points that have X-values of zero. 若要显示传统散点图，请添加具有非零的 X 值的数据点。To display a traditional scatter chart, add data points that have X-values other than zero. 不需要设置数据点的 X 值。The X-values of data points are not required to be set. 如果未设置，会绘制数据点按顺序使用从其索引值。If they are not set, data points are plotted sequentially, using their index values from the .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <double> ^ YValues { cli::array <double> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <double> ^ value); };
member this.YValues : double[] with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置数据点的 Y 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y-value(s) of a data point.

value.span: 值的数组，这些值表示数据点的 Y 值。

span.span: An array of values that represent the Y-value(s) of a data point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于设置数据点的 Y 值。The property is used to set the Y-values of data points. 每个点的仅一个 Y 值是必需的所有图表类型中除气泡图、 k 线图和股价图。Only one Y-value per point is required for all chart types except bubble, candlestick and stock charts. 这些图表类型需要多个 Y 值，因为一个数据点的多个值组成。These chart types require more than one Y-value because one data point consists of multiple values. 例如，若要绘制一个股票图表列，四个值是必需的： 高、 低、 打开和关闭的值。For example, to plot one stock chart column, four values are required: high, low, open and close values. 属性返回的数组`double`值时用于检索 Y 值。The property returns an array of `double` values when used to retrieve the Y-values. **重要**属性确定中所有数据都点的 Y 值的最大数目可以有。**Important** The property determines the maximum number of Y-values that all data points in a can have. 如果指定多个允许的 Y 值数，将引发异常。If you specify more than the allowable number of Y-values, an exception will be raised.
